Content: Pro traders arent any better at predicting where the market will go than a hobby trader and its not the job. The difference is all in execution Finding lvls protecting profits once available stopping out  adjusting when wrong and consistant loss size control. Focus there

Its a holiday session but #ES_F still providing decent action. I gave two targets for this holiday session 5662 this has been resistance of the 2 week flag. We just hit then 5672. At this point nothing to do now but ride those runners.  5672 567982 next if ES wants it

Holiday in #ES_F 1pm close. Low vol grind likely dont overtrade. On Friday I was looking for a rally to 5650 off the textbook failed breakdown  we hit 5650 at the close. 558556622 week flag  Plan 564844support. Keeps 5662 breakout 5672 live. 5644 fails dip 5630

A game changer for me was learning the difference between forecasting  trading. Forecasters try to predict multileg price paths. No one does it consistently well. Traders focus on finding actionable zones for the next lvl to lvl move then start over. Easier far more lucrative

Have a great weekend! After a 550 point August rally #ES_F spent its last two weeks basing. The pattern is a bull flag 5585 support 5660 resistance  Plan Next Week Fill out 562530mid pivot. As long as flag holds 5700 5720 5780 are next. We short only if the flag fails

Theres 5650 tagged up an incredible 50 points in #ES_F from this afternoons textbook failed breakdown of Thursdays low  provided explicitly in yesterdays newsletter. 5620 5630 5650 were targets. Long weekend incoming lock in gains let a runner go.  5680 5730 next up

Closing update #ES_F Textbook example of my core setup this afternoon The Failed Breakdown of Thursday low. 5620 5630 5650 and first two clipped. Breakout takes us to 5680 and beyond when ES is ready. Newsletter out soon talking triggers for next week tradecompanion.substack.com

Perfect follow through off the textbook failed breakdown of yesterdays low in #ES_F. In ranges we see this setup daily. 5620 then 5630 were targets and no shock where we just hit 5630 for the 28th test since last Monday. Lock in gains leave runner  5650 breakout next

Action slowing ahead of the long week. 5585 to 5650 remains the range and it will provoke a large trend move but after extensive trapping. As per yesterdays 4pm newsletter what we just saw was a classic failed breakdown of yesterdays low  5620 hit 5630 5650 if #ES_F wants

We continue to ping pong the 56505585 chop zone in #ES_F and as discussed extensively these ranges are defined failed breakdowns trade the traps. Quick failed breakdown of yesterdays low and now back at the key 5611 level. 5620 5630 5654 next if ES wants  5604 5585supports

We continue to nicely fill out 56505585 chop zone in #ES_F as warned in my 4pm newsletter last night we would. We have been traversing this range for 2 weeks  its a masterclass in how range trading works  From here 5604support. 5611 must recover to pop. 5596 5585 below

5630 remains an ATM machine and there have been four 12 point bounces off it just today and we just tested for the 27th time in #ES_F since last Monday. Nearly unprecedented.   No change. 5620 5611 tested already remain supports. 5630 must reclaim to resume to 5650

And 1 hour after the last test of 5630 and a great 15 point bounce we are back again now for test #26 in #ES_F in the last week. 5585 to 5650 remains a 2 week flag with 5630 midmagnet. Dont overtrade  No change 5650 live when ES ready. 5620 5611 tested remains supports

Yet again nobody should be shocked where #ES_F is 5630. This is the 25th test in 2 weeks. 55855650 is the 2 week flag with 5630 midmagnet. The most stubborn level this year. Dont overtrade today before a long weekend  No change 5620 5611 Held. They keep 5650 live today

Late day I was looking for a rally back to 5630 in #ES_F and should be no shock where we are 5630 for the 24th test in 2 weeks. 55855654the range  traders are getting a lesson in range trading  Plan today 5620 5611 heldsupports. Keeps 5650 live direct now. 5668 above
My first 100 point runner woohoo!!! Thanks Adam love your NL changed my trading by 1000

Closing update #ES_F 55855654 remains the flag with 5630 midmagnet  we continue to fill out as expected. 5654 was target today and we hit overshot sold. 5611 keeps 5630 5650 live again. 5604 558590 below. Newsletter out soon talking entries tmrw tradecompanion.substack.com

Its been fantastic rangebound trading in #ES_F as we continue to work the 5585 to 5654 range. After last nights 5585 failed breakdown 5654 was todays target and we tagged overshot then filling out  Same drill 561115support. 5630 must reclaim to resume up. 558590 below
